need_candidates.comment_requirements: Giulia might be interested in hiring designers and potentially other roles such as project managers.

Working with incoming requests.
Mostly telephone sales, around 60 calls per day + close sales. But there are also correspondences (mainly with clients we have already spoken with over the phone).

employment_statuses.name: Full Time
employment_statuses.description: (160 hours) 5 days per week,  8 hours per day+1 hour lunch

need_candidates.comment_requirements:
Creating content for social media, managing emails, maintaining website pages, payment systems, and community management (client interactions and uploading recorded sessions).
Basic technical skills and flexibility to handle a range of tasks across content creation, customer interactions, and general administrative tasks.

Overseeing social media marketing, approving content, managing campaigns, and giving strategic direction for sales and marketing initiatives.

 Strong understanding of social media channels (Instagram, Facebook, email marketing via ActiveCampaign), ad campaign management, and content direction.

note:
updated
We are going to discuss options for partnership in managing human resources for GEOREKA 3D Geological Modelling Software (Austria) in Ukraine. 

Website: rh-s.com

Company website: https://www.georeka.com/

Comments: Hilco van Moerkerk

(https://www.linkedin.com/in/hilco-van-moerkerk-b370095/)

Main interest at the moment is on the marketing side: social media content for LinkedIn, video editing for website. But also training videos. Hope to get better idea during the chat. Cheers, Hilco

Manager: Korzhova Liudmyla

Company Name : GEOREKA 3D Geological Modelling Software 

Company Website :  https://www.georeka.com/

Contact Person : Hilco van Moerkerk
 
Specialties: Mining & Metals

Country-Location : Austria

Target Audience: worldwide

Immediate Requirement : GEOREKA software provides innovative solutions to 3D geological modelling, integrating machine learning with conventional methods. GEOREKA Software started in October 2012. Since then it has increasingly impressed people worldwide. 
Hilco needs a help in marketing, communicate with clients and manage his calendar as content manager ( to write and run LinkedIn page) and video editor (.need videos, pictures through PowerPoint.) Training planning content and videos for step by step how and what to do -would be appreciative.
The has different projects with his software, but it will start in few months.
As for now part time employement would be good for each.

Potential position(s)/Future needs: -

Status by the position(s) (possible / impossible) : possible

Next Step: send all information about our services.

Next Contact Day : follow up in 2 weeks

The client was engaged by LG manager.

SM Svetlana (Marina)

name: Tommi Wallenius
note:
updated
Result:
Company Name: Hydrohex
Company Website: http://www.hydrohex.com
Contact Person: Tommi Wallenius
Product: Using their knowledge of water exercising, they created an immersive virtual workout experience in the water. 
The waterproof screen, easy to use software and proven workout programs combined create the easiest water fitness service available. Their first to market virtual workout concept in the water enables scalable fitness offerings for pools without added personnel costs!
WHY HYDROHEX?
- Activate our pool during off-peak hours with virtual workouts
- Available 24/7 to our customers
- Effective and trendy workout programs
- Fresh content with updates and support
Country-Location: Finland
Target Audience: worldwide
Immediate Requirement: Tommi is interested in Lead Generator Manager (German language will be a great option). Such a person is needed in 2-3 weeks. 
Next Step: send all information about our company and CVs of candidates. 
Next Contact Date: keep in touch by email. Set up an interview 17th of June (in the morning, before noon)

name: Martin Lampron
note:
need people to create leads and follow up accounts for our clients.
RESULT
Company Name: Xpand Group - International Business Development

Company Website: http://www.xpand-group.com

Contact Person: Martin Lampron

Product:  Thereby, Xpand Group offers a perfect solution to have flexible, accelerated and affordable expansion projects.  They have multicultural and multi-disciplinary teams that will adapt and structure a personalized study to support your strategic decisions.  

Their four steps services:

- Preliminary Analysis

- Planning

- Implementation

- Business Intelligence

Specialties:  Accompagnement, Gestion, Formation, Commercialisation, Logistique et douanes, Business Development , and International Commerce

Country-Location: Canada

Target Audience: Europe. 

Immediate Requirement: Martins needs a Lead Generator Managers with really good English (German and French speaking people will be a great option for him). The candidate should be able to work in New York Time. He wants to start working part time. 

Next Step: send all information about our company, example of contract. At the end of the week he will send us a job description by email. After that we need to choose the most suitable candidates. 

Next Contact Date: keep in touch by email

note:
I am looking for someone that ideally will have one of the following backgrounds ( doesnt have to be full degree it can be work experience)  Architect technician/ Architecture, Mechanical Electrical engineering, Constructions studies, and skills to research products and manufactures in those industries in the Ukraine market.

RESULT

Company Name: Montek Connection

Company Website: https://montek.ie/

Contact Person: Monika Wojtek

Product: Montek is an Irish company specialising in sourcing products that are manufactured in Europe on Your behalf. Their online catalogue includes a selection of Glass Magnetic Whiteboard; Street Furniture. Meeting Pods, Sheds, Outdoor Kitchens, Gates, Fencing and other items.
Country-Location: Ireland

Target Audience: worldwide

Immediate Requirement: LG manager with good English level and good understanding in Architecture, Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Construction Research and product.

Next Step: we will send information about our company and after that we will send CV`s of possible candidates and arrange an interview next week
